name: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra
highlights:
Not announced yet
214 g
Android 16, up to 7 major upgrades, One UI 8
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front (Corning Gorilla Armor 2), glass back (Gorilla Glass Victus 2), titanium frame (grade 5)
BODY.SIM:
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time) - INT
· Nano-SIM + eSIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time) - USA
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM - CN
BODY:
IP68 dust tight and water resistant (immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)
Stylus

PLATFORM.OS: Android 16, up to 7 major Android upgrades, One UI 8
PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Quad:
200 MP, f/1.7, 24mm (wide), 1/1.3", 0.6µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS
10 MP, (telephoto), 1/3.94", PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
50 MP, f/3.4, 111mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.52", 0.7µm, PDAF, OIS, 5x optical zoom
50 MP, f/1.9, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.5", 0.7µm, dual pixel PDAF, Super Steady video
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, Best Face, LED flash, auto-HDR, panorama
MAIN CAMERA.Video: 8K@24/30fps, 4K@30/60/120fps, 1080p@30/60/120/240fps, 10-bit HDR, HDR10+, stereo sound rec., gyro-EIS

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
FEATURES:
Samsung DeX, Samsung Wireless DeX (desktop experience support)
Ultra Wideband (UWB) support

BATTERY.Charging:
60W wired, PD3.0
15W wireless (Qi2 Ready)
4.5W reverse wireless
